name: Project Bean (ReadySetRain)
description:
This is my first Unity project and while it is a concept level for a game like Overcooked but based on coffee drinks, it's mostly just a way for me to learn as much about Unity developing with as little pre-production as possible.

There's a lot jank I didn't bother to polish out because most of it is baked into bad decisions made early on and any further development of the concept will likely require a complete restart anyway.
